ygData.subject: Re: for a lvl 16...
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, latly at lvl 16... I duel weild a Combine Long Swor and a Fine Steel long sowrd.  but, latly I ve been getting fullg roups and hunting in highpass on the
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, latly at lvl 16... I duel weild a Combine Long Swor and a Fine Steel
long sowrd. but, latly I've been getting fullg roups and hunting in
highpass on the ORC side. also I have been grouping with 1 or 2 and going
after thoughs minos in beholder. I ocasionly fighting in the East karana
bridge... Karana is my homeland. and what I belive in. Thanks all for your
info... I'll try thoughs bandit camps but i've already done them at lvl
10-12.


----Original Message Follows----
From: mark mark <markerob@...>
Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] for a lvl 16...
Date: Wed, 30 Jun 1999 18:08:15 PDT

From: mark mark <markerob@...>

While highpass may be good for loot, I've always thought it a little too
risky for 16 unless you are in a group. I prefered hunting at the bridge to
north-east Karana on the eastern side. While this won't get you a lot of
loot, you will level quickly. For loot around lev 16 find a group and hunt
bandits, they drop bronze weapons and shouldn't be that hard for you. HHmmm
for loot alone if you have a magic weapon you can hunt wisps on Eurids
crossing, or if you don't have one you can hunt the zombies there. Paw is
also a good place to go, you could kill Nobles there and get both loot and
exp. Oh, and if you can get together a party the gorge is wonderful for
both as well, just stay clear of the evil eyes.

Arathorne, Solsek Ro
